# CAM::GET_FOLLOW_PED_CAM_ZOOM_LEVEL

## Summary
Gets the global zoom level used by all follow-ped cameras

## Returns
* **PED_ZOOM_LEVEL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Deprecated! Please now use GET_FOLLOW_PED_CAM_VIEW_MODE
